articles.title: Nathan Lyon: From groundsman to 100 Tests for Australia - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Lyon debuted after Australia tried 11 spinners post Shane Warne, and is now among the most successful spinners
articles.content: Following the retirement of Shane Warne, Australia went through 11 spinners to try and fill the void - including specialist batsmen given the role - and a chap called Steven Smith. Then in 2011, they… [+5940 chars]
